short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage WordPress from one easy dashboard. Let WP Blazer handle all the tedious tasks so you can focus on what matters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WPBlazer works like a centralised command centre providing instant access to all your sites from one dashboard..WPBlazer chrome extension helps the customer onboarding process. Customer can quickly add their Wordpress website to WPBlazer platform. It just takes a few clicks to add.
